Firstly, we load necessary library *tidyverse* for Problem 1 and 2.
```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Problem 1
## *1.1 Load Penguins  Dataset*
We load the "penguins" dataset from the package "palmerpenguins".
```{r, include=FALSE}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```
